name: Wiz Max 3 - C64 game
description:
WIZ MAX 3

... The VoxVideoGame & Co.... Presents you......!!! 

 A nice adventure, action and magic game called..." Wiz Max - 3 "......The Wiz Max saga continues... The adventures of "Max" the ball wizard continue; after the versions of a few years ago '... the 2019 and 2020 versions 1.0,2.0 and 2.1...
This time the cute ball wizard will have to face it, against stray skeletons, killer magic eyes, suspicious refrigerators, nervous snowmen...To then collect the magic bonuses and path... and then unlock the spell of the Dark Wizard...and save the world...!

Pinov Vox
